metadata.title: CVE-2023-6683 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the QEMU built-in VNC server while processingClientCutText messages. The qemu_clipboard_request() function can bereached before vnc_server_cut_text_caps() was called and had the chance toinitialize the clipboard peer, leading to a NULL pointer dereference. Thiscould allow a malicious authenticated VNC client to crash QEMU and triggera denial of service.

criterions.comment: qemu package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
